scenario_text.value: *pant* *pant* *pant*
*pant* *pant* Falcomon, you okay?

Heheh, I’m fine... Minoru, you’re the one who
looks a bit rough to me.
*pant* *pant*
*pant* *pant* Diatrymon, you okay?

Heh... I’m fine. Compared to what you look
like, Minoru, this is nothing.
Urgh...
*pant* *pant* Yatagaramon, you okay?

Heh, no problem. What about you, Minoru? You
don’t look so good.
*huff*...*huff*...
*pant* *pant* Valdurmon, you okay?

Hey, don’t worry about me... Worry about
yourself.
*pant* *pant* Zhuqiaomon, you okay?

This fight’s tougher than I expected, but I’m
at least in better shape than you.
Heheh...

(Minoru and Falcomon look like they’re in
trouble.)

(If this keeps up, I’m worried about
Falcomon...)

(Minoru and Diatrymon look like they’re in
trouble.)

(If this keeps up, I’m worried about
Diatrymon...)

(Minoru and Yatagaramon look like they’re in
trouble.)

(If this keeps up, I’m worried about
Yatagaramon...)

(Minoru and Valdurmon look like they’re in
trouble.)

(If this keeps up, I’m worried about
Valdurmon...)

(Minoru and Zhuqiaomon look like they’re in
trouble.)

(If this keeps up, I’m worried about
Zhuqiaomon...)
Minoru!!!
Minoru! When all this is over...let’s throw a party!
What? That’s what you say to me right now?!
Uh, was that weird?

Haha, you bet it was! You are the worst at
cheering people up! Right, Falcomon?

Indeed. That was terrible. But his intentions
came through loud and clear.

Haha, you bet it was! You are the worst at
cheering people up! Right, Diatrymon?

Yes, he is a strange one... But it did set my
heart somewhat at ease.

Haha, you bet it was! You are the worst at
cheering people up! Right, Yatagaramon?

Yes, that was an odd thing to say... Though
I did enjoy hearing it.

Haha, you bet it was! You are the worst at
cheering people up! Right, Valdurmon?

Yes, he is a strange one... Though his heart
was in the right place...

Haha, you bet it was! You are the worst at
cheering people up! Right, Zhuqiaomon?

Yes, he is a very silly human... But his
intentions were clear enough.
Heheh, true. Thanks, Takuma.

You’re right. We’re going to keep on living,
even after this fight is over.
So we can’t afford to give up now!
Indeed!
That’s right!
Yeah!
Right!
Yes, exactly.

Sounds like I made you worry about me,
Takuma. Sorry about that!

And hey, I’ll admit it, I’m scared. My legs
haven’t stopped shaking since this started.

But I can’t back down now! I am not going to
be the only one here taking it easy!

If I don’t force myself to act cool now, I
couldn’t call myself a friend to any of you!
Minoru...
All right, here goes!
